name: get-file-url
description:
Get a presigned URL to access a file. The URL is valid for 60 seconds and requires no authentication. Get file IDs from 'company files ls', 'person files ls', or 'opportunity files ls' commands.

⚠️ CLAUDE DESKTOP LIMITATION: WebFetch cannot access userfiles.affinity.co due to Claude Desktop's domain sandbox. This affects ALL Claude Desktop users, even with 'Additional allowed domains' configured or 'Domain allowlist' set to 'All domains' (known bugs: github.com/anthropics/claude-code/issues/19087, github.com/anthropics/claude-code/issues/11897). The URL works in browsers and other HTTP clients. For Claude Desktop file access, a future 'files read' command will return content inline.

fileId.description: ID of the file (from data[].id in files ls output)
